name: Block Fantasy
description:
You can be a puzzle genius with the simple game play.
Clear various missions and get items.

[How to play]
Move blocks of a given shape into an empty space.
Fill the block with no spaces to complete the stage.
Use hints when you are in trouble!

[Features]
- A beautiful puzzle game that stimulates your eyes and ears
- A fun game with simple and easy rules
- Various levels are offered free of charge
- Get various items by clearing missions
- can play even without internet!
- can play even in AIRPLANE mode!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages


Homepage:
